title: My Pixel 3XL has randomly rebooted twice today within 30 minutes to total of 5 times this month.
content:
This is my RMA unit due to death pixel on the screen. I got it in the first week of September and it has rebooted 5 times. 

1st time while I was browsing the Google Photos
2 & 3 time were after I have existed Google Maps Navigation
4 & 5 browsing the web using Chrome

It is running the latest Android version and patch.

Does anyone have this problem?  Thanks.
